text: Melissa Ivy Rauch (born June 23, 1980) is an American actress and comedian. She works mainly on television. She plays Bernadette on the television sitcom The Big Bang Theory. Rauch was born in Marlboro Township, New Jersey. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:1980 births Category:Living people
title: Melissa Rauch
